INSERT INTO pathmarker_t (contentid, path_post_idx, mapy, mapx, areacode, sigungucode,contenttypeid,title,regdate) VALUES (#{contentid}, #{path_post_idx},#{mapy},#{mapx},#{areacode}, #{sigungucode}, #{contenttypeid}, #{title}, sysdate())
